tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE basketball_player (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(100),
  height FLOAT,
  weight FLOAT,
  position VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE players (
  player_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(50),
  height DECIMAL(4, 2),
  weight DECIMAL(5, 2),
  position VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE players (
    player_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    height FLOAT,
    weight FLOAT,
    position VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE teams (
    team_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    team_name VARCHAR(255),
    city VARCHAR(100),
    coach VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE player_stats (
    player_id INT,
    points INT,
    rebounds INT,
    assists INT,
    steals INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (player_id) REFERENCES players(player_id)
)

CREATE TABLE players (
    player_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR,
    height FLOAT,
    weight FLOAT,
    position VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE player_stats (
    stat_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    player_id INT,
    matches_played INT,
    points_scored INT,
    assists INT
);
CREATE TABLE players ( player_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, player_name STRING, player_height INT, player_weight INT, player_position STRING );
CREATE TABLE teams ( team_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, team_name STRING, team_city STRING, team_established INT );
CREATE TABLE player_stats ( player_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, points_scored INT, assists INT, rebounds INT, steals INT, blocks INT );
CREATE TABLE games ( game_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, game_date DATE, home_team_id UUID, away_team_id UUID, home_team_score INT, away_team_score INT );
CREATE TABLE coaches ( coach_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, coach_name STRING, years_experience INT, team_id UUID );
